== Video Overview ==

This screencast takes you through how to share files over SMB file sharing (also known as windows file sharing).

== Target Audience ==

People that would like to access their files across different machines

== Pre-requisites ==

An ubuntu machine connected to a network connection

== Required Knowledge ==

Basic knowledge of ubuntu and networking

== Recommended Knowledge ==

None

== Objectives ==

* Show how to browse samba shares from within ubuntu
* Show how to mount the shares, providing easy access to them
* Show how to set up a samba share
